name: @nui/openwhisk-newrelic
description: Library for gathering metrics for Apache OpenWhisk actions and sending them to NewRelic

scripts.test: nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha test --recursive && npm run checkout-node-fetch && npm run test-node-fetch
scripts.checkout-node-fetch: rm -rf node-fetch; git clone https://github.com/node-fetch/node-fetch.git; cd node-fetch; git checkout b44c29521d61e0badb0220ac4d59bcfeef986ea2; npm install; patch -p1 < ../test/node-fetch-disable-flaky-tests.patch
